data.description: Pool re-surfaced with pebbletec; pool converted to salt water in 2022; roof replaced; both bathrooms remodeled; all flooring replaced with wood laminate and tile; cabinets and shoe cubbies added in garage; whole-house water filtration system; gas insert can be used to heat the house in colder months; windows upgraded to dual pane, with bathrooms and kitchen featuring double-hung windows; whole-house fan; newer water heater; 20'x15' fenced garden area; wrought iron pool fence plus a sliding gate to section off the side yard; LOTS of shade in the summer months while still earning a score of 77 for potential solar panels; wide street; friendly neighbors.
